xataio/pgroll

pgroll lets you update your Postgres schema with zero downtime, so your apps keep running while you make changes

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Postgres replication tool handling schema and data changes, streams to various outputs
  • Real-time UI sync with Postgres
  • AI agent monitors and troubleshoots PostgreSQL databases
  • transparent SQL cache for Postgres and MySQL, no code changes
  • pg-boss: job queue for Node.js using PostgreSQL for storage
  • A terminal user interface for PostgreSQL databases
  • columnstore analytics for Postgres tables with real-time sync
  • Send and receive messages, sync user state, listen for database updates over WebSockets with Postgres
